org.sbml.jsbml.xml.parsers

Interface AnnotationWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SBMLRDFAnnotationParser

    public interface AnnotationWriter
    The interface to implement for the SBML parsers writing SBML annotations.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nicolas Rodriguez

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XMLNode writeAnnotation(SBase contextObject, XMLNode xmlNode)
      Writes the annotation of the given SBase object into the given XMLNode.

    • Method Detail

      • writeAnnotation

        XMLNode writeAnnotation(SBase contextObject,
                        XMLNode xmlNode)
        Writes the annotation of the given SBase object into the given XMLNode.

        This method can change the content of the XMLNode by removing or adding nodes.

        Parameters:
        contextObject -
        xmlNode -
        Returns:
